::KitKat::

She was running northward following her nose.  She ran past a few 
lakes and stopped at one.  It had a little snow on the edges of the 
lake.  The water looked cool and clear.  She ran up the shore line 
and dove in.  She felt the cold water against her skin.  See swam 
along the shore enjoying the outdoors again.  This was her element.  
This was her place.  She felt at home here.  She walked out of the 
lake and shook herself off.  She layed down in the sun on a soft 
patch of grass.  She looked up at the sky and realixed it had been a 
while since she checked in.  She opened up her commlink.

"Hey Quickstike, Wish you were here.  This place is great.  The 
scenery is beautiful here.  Kind of makes one glad to be functional. 
I'll return back to base shortly." She closed her link and relaxed in 
the grass.  This was the matrix out here.
